solution_line_template: Patrick eats {patrick_fraction} of the {alvin_eats} egg rolls that Alvin eats, {patrick_fraction} x {alvin_eats} = <<{patrick_fraction}*{alvin_eats}={patrick_eats}>>{patrick_eats} egg rolls.

Matthew eats {matthew_multiplier}x as many egg rolls as Patrick eats, {matthew_multiplier} x {patrick_eats} = <<{matthew_multiplier}*{patrick_eats}={matthew_eats}>>{matthew_eats} egg rolls that Matthew eats.
